health_sector_discussed_people_names: Hon. Njuguna Mwaura, Hon. Wilson Mwangi, Hon. Joseph Kamanu, Hon. Peter Mbae, Hon. John Ndonyo, Hon. Simon Mwangi
health_data_challenges: Lack of recognition and guiding laws for Community Health Volunteers, non-receipt of stipends by volunteers
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Enacting laws to recognize and support Community Health Volunteers, ensuring stipend payments, providing NHIF cover, equipment, and training for volunteers
health_evidence_base: Public memorandums, challenges in rural areas, infant mortality rates, need for training and capacity building for Community Health Volunteers
